attributes.action: give UMA (uniform maintenance allowance) to sixth formers forced to wear 'office attire'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some sixth forms force students to wear office attire, but this is an additional cost as students have to purchase new clothes, preventing them from buying casual clothes, books and stationary. 

UMA would cover the costs incurred for this.
